column2: Activities
Supporting Export agricultural crops
Identification of farmers and conduct basic awareness on cultivation of export agriculture crops
Make Initial arrangement with Dept. of Export Agriculture for supply of Plants.
Supply and distribution of plants (Pepper, coffee, ginger)
Conducting awareness quality improvement and minimizing of post-harvest losses
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting paddy cultivation
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness of “Parachute method”
Arranging of farmers contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distributions of seed planting trays
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting for protection of crops from animals
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conduct awareness on agricultural crop protection from wild animals
Arranging of farmer contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distributions of electric fence (Viduli Pambaya)
Monitoring and supervision
Implementation of protected agricultural methods (polytonal)
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conduct awareness on protected agriculture
Arranging of farmer contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distributions of polytonal
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting fruit cultivation
Identification farmers and conducting basic awareness on cultivation
Land preparation for cultivation
Supply and distributions of fruit plants (Banna, Mango, Avocado) to the farmers
Monitoring and supervision
Introducing of value addition and new technology
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers/ producers
Conducting basic awareness on processing
Supply and distributions of following machine and Equipment to the farmers and producers -  Curry powder grinding, Bee keeping units.
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting animal husbandry
Identification and signing of MOU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness programs
Supply and providing of suitable animals - Cows, Goat, Chicks
Providing support to construction of sheds, Sheds – cow, Sheds – goat
Monitoring and supervision
